body_html: Resources like thread-pool and memory allocator are shared between sessions. Shutting down the session would not shut down shared resources because those resources may be reused for future sessions. I guess you want an API to shut down memory allocator/thread-pool, which doesn't exist AFAIK

body: Resources like thread-pool and memory allocator are shared between sessions. Shutting down the session would not shut down shared resources because those resources may be reused for future sessions. I guess you want an API to shut down memory allocator/thread-pool, which doesn't exist AFAIK
